snippet: A Palestinian gunman fired at Israeli soldiers and military police during a raid in the occupied West Bank on Monday and the Israeli forces shot and killed the attacker in response, the army and police said in a statement....

headline.main: South African Attack Bolstered Ahead of NZ Tests
headline.print_headline: South African Attack Bolstered Ahead of NZ Tests

lead_paragraph: A Palestinian gunman fired at Israeli soldiers and military police during a raid in the occupied West Bank on Monday and the Israeli forces shot and killed the attacker in response, the army and police said in a statement.
